name: Enoki Carrots
description: This Enoki Carrots recipe is perfect for anyone looking for a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar option to incorporate into their healthy eating habits. It combines the crunchy sweetness of carrots with the delicate texture of Enoki mushrooms, making it a delightful addition to the 'Healthy Recipes' and 'Healthified Recipes' collections.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and peel the carrots. Slice them into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the base off of the Enoki mushrooms and separate them gently.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, add the carrots and sauté for approximately 5 minutes, until they start to soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Enoki mushrooms to the pan with the carrots and sauté together for an additional 3 minutes, until the mushrooms are tender and the carrots are cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
